# Tender Notice:
## Request for Proposal (RFP) - Modified Shipping Container
### Reference Number: WS3588171734
### Solicitation Number: WS3588171734
### Publication Date: August 24, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: October 26, 2022, at 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), in collaboration with the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan), invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of a modified shipping container for climate-controlled testing at the Climate Controlled Test Facility at Building 19 at the Bells Corners Complex in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Contract Requirements:
A modified storage container is required for climate-controlled testing to support the Climate Controlled Test Facility at Building 19 at the Bells Corners Complex, Ottawa, Ontario.

### Deliverables:
One (1) modified shipping container meeting specified requirements

### Delivery:
Delivery is expected within 30 days from contract award

### Key Dates:
* Tender Closing Date: October 26, 2022, at 14:00:00
* Anticipated Contract Start Date: As of the Contract Award Date
* Anticipated Contract End Date: March 24, 2025

### Additional Information:
The tender is open to all interested suppliers. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender. Suppliers may submit their proposals in either official language of Canada. A comprehensive solicitation document detailing specifications and mandatory requirements is available for review.

### Contact Information:
For more information, please contact:
Ann Lacelle
Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: 
Fax:
